Reduce movies sizes on linux/notes/reduce-movies-sizes-on-linux/Tue, 20 Oct 2015 00:00:00 +0000/notes/reduce-movies-sizes-on-linux/ffmpeg -i test.mp4 -b 1000000 -strict experimental output.mp4
Pigs for parallel compression/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Mon, 02 Jun 2014 00:00:00 +0000/notes/pigs-for-parallel-compression/Compress tar -c --use-compress-program=pigz -f someDir.tar.gz someDir/ DeCompress pigz -dc someDir.tar.gz | tar xf -
